itunes:title: Episode 589 - Special Guest Asking Alexandria's Danny Worsnop
title: Episode 589 - Special Guest Asking Alexandria's Danny Worsnop
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back special guest “Asking Alexandria” lead singer Danny Worsnop to discuss how those in the music entertainment industry are preparing for a year of no crowds, why Danny’s life in the midst of the quarantine has n...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back special guest “Asking Alexandria” lead singer Danny Worsnop to discuss how those in the music entertainment industry are preparing for a year of no crowds, why Danny’s life in the midst of the quarantine has not changed, the 3 reminisce about their time on the Drinkin’ Bros Cruise, and Danny ends the show by shaving his beard off live on air.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back special guest “Asking Alexandria” lead singer Danny Worsnop to discuss how those in the music entertainment industry are preparing for a year of no crowds, why Danny’s life in the midst of the quarantine has not changed, the 3 reminisce about their time on the Drinkin’ Bros Cruise, and Danny ends the show by shaving his beard off live on air.
